summary: In the summer time when the weather is fine... I mean when it's winter time and there's dragons outside.
descriptionHtml:
Initially this was just a personal mod, how ever how could I possibly deny everyone the opportunity to fight dragons with the legendary Ray Dorset, king of the groove.

He can be found in the Bannered Mare, conjuring up a groovy funk storm for all the tavern ladies.

If you want to customize this mod to your own preferences or change it in any way feel free to, preferably feature me as the initial author but you have no obligation to if not desired.
author: thethruster27
